name: Platformer (DEMO)
description:
This was made in order for me to practice rigidbodies in Godot.

My personal best time is 9.7 seconds. If you beat my time try sending me a message, (with a screenshot as proof) and I might add something in the game as thanks for trying my game.

Controls

JumpUp Arrow
MoveLeft/Right Arrow
RestartRExitEscape

This is just a prototype, but I may try to improve this in the future.
